name: Petzl V-Link Tether Leash
description: Stretchy umbilicals for tethering your ice tools so you don't drop them. Light, compact and stretchy, they are also totally useable with gloves on.Total retracted length of 46cm.Total extended length of 106cm.Swivel keeps the two arms from tangling.Lightweight aluminum clips.Easy to clip and unclip, even when wearing gloves.Warning: Not designed to be load-bearing, nor for catching falls.
